meanings.meaning: having completed a course of study

examples: The teaching staff are all highly qualified.
Applications are invited from suitably qualified individuals.
She is a professionally qualified social worker.
She is now qualified as a teacher.

meanings.meaning: having the skill needed to do sth

examples: Elaine did not feel qualified to comment.
My father was well qualified to act the part of a head teacher.
The proposals received heavily qualified approval.
